messages.msgSnippet: Time life has an enchanted series of book, and one of them is about Dragons, I think their are 22 book total.  They are out of print, but you can find them on
messages.messageBody:
Time life has an enchanted series of book, and one of them is about Dragons,
I think their are 22 book total. They are out of print, but you can find
them on Ebay, they are pretty good book, I have several.

Bec,
Camano Island Homeschoolers,
Washington Unschoolers,
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/Washingtonunschoolers/

messages.subject: Dragon mythology
messages.msgSnippet: I can t remember if this (dragon mythology) was mentioned here or not. If anyone knows some good jumping off points or books, please email in private :) Thanks
messages.messageBody:
I can't remember if this (dragon mythology) was mentioned here or not. If anyone knows some good jumping off points or books, please email in private :)

Thanks

Camille
Do not meddle in the affairs of dragons, for you are crunchy and taste good with ketchup. :)
